name: remove_small_boxes
description: Remove boxes which contains at least one side smaller than min_size.

inputs.name: boxes
inputs.description: (Tensor[K, 5] or List[Tensor[L, 4]]) â€“ the box coordinates in (x1, y1, x2, y2) format where the regions will be taken from. The coordinate must satisfy 0 <= x1 < x2 and 0 <= y1 < y2. If a single Tensor is passed, then the first column should contain the index of the corresponding element in the batch, i.e. a number in [0, N - 1]. If a list of Tensors is passed, then each Tensor will correspond to the boxes for an element i in the batch.
